Charter to offer Free WiFi for 60 days

div.div:
Oscoda Area Schools is pleased to announce the formation of the Distinguished Alumni Award. This award is to recognize Distinguished Alumni of Oscoda Area High School who have used their educational foundation to achieve significant accomplishments and/or excellence in their chosen profession. Inductees will serve as role models for succeeding generations and will be honored with a picture and biographical sketch to be prominently displayed at Oscoda High School for years to come.
Nominations for the inaugural award will be accepted until February 1, 2020. Additional information and nomination forms are available in the high school or Board of Education office and via the internet at www.oscodaschools.org.
Distinguished Alumni Nomination Form
To be considered for this award, the nominee must have been a graduate of Oscoda Area High School at least ten years prior to nomination and have demonstrated traits such as leadership, citizenship, character and volunteerism.
For additional information, please contact Terry Allison, high school principal, at 989-739-9121.
Oscoda Area Schools Approved 2019-2020 Continuity of Learning and COVID-19 Response Plan
